players.name: Alice
memory: You're Alice, the detective.
Night 1 begins.
Bob was found dead.
You investigated Charlie and discovered that they are the mafioso.
Day 1 begins.
You: "Charlie is the mafia. Bob was killed last night and Charlie is the only mafia member in this game. I investigated Charlie and confirmed it."
Charlie: "I have nothing to hide and I trust everyone in this game. Let's focus on gathering more information before making any hasty decisions."
Diana: "I believe we should remain calm and gather more information before jumping to conclusions. Let's focus on observing everyone's behaviors and actions during the day and night phases."

Diana: "Let's remember that making assumptions based on one night's events can be misleading. We should all take some time to observe each other's actions and behaviors during the day to gather more information before coming to any conclusions."
You: "Charlie is the mafia. I investigated Charlie last night and confirmed it. Bob was killed last night. Charlie is the only mafia member."

Charlie: "I want to clarify that I did not kill Bob last night. I believe it's important for us all to remain open-minded and gather more information before making accusations. Let's continue observing everyone's behaviors and actions during the day and night..."
Votes: Alice voted for Charlie, Charlie voted for Diana (the vote was cast randomly because of a failed format), Diana voted for Alice (the vote was cast randomly because of a failed format)
Diana was arrested
